Thanksgiving movie! I remember wondering when this came out why it didn't get a ton of attention. Now that I'm rewatching it a decade plus later, I understand why. The heist is underwhelming, the whole story feels one-note and the supporting cast is somewhat forgettable.

All of that aside, I actually really enjoyed this movie. I'll watch anything starring Ben Stiller, Eddie Murphy provided a few good laughs and I find myself quoting Matthew Broderick's Mr. Fitzhugh more often than I realized. There are some good third-act payoffs as well. 

Not great, not bad, but still an enjoyable "holiday" flick. 

Best Character: Mr. Fitzhugh
Best Quote: " I'm very sorry, Mr. Shaw, but we don't accept tips at the tower." -  Dev'Reaux
Best Scene: Prepping for the Heist
Best Piece of Score: "Theme from Tower Heist"

Tower Heist cuenta con cientos de huecos argumentales y guionazos para que la historia avance, pero logra ser emocionante, una historia de reminiscencia con toques de comedia igual de bien implementados cómo su acción, y para mi es lo que la vuelve especial, el compaginar ese toque más de thriller con tintes de comedia para volver accesible esta historia a todo el público. A estas alturas creo que todos somos conscientes del cine de Ben Stiller y Eddie Murphy; y creo que, si entramos en la convención de su propio subgénero que ellos mismos han creado, esta historia cumple a creces, pero si hay expectativas de un buen thriller con tintes noventeros esta historia es todo lo contrario, lo cual no es malo. Yo creo que el mismo público y la crítica han desvalorizado el género de la comedia cómo tal, y para mí sería una pena el subestimar el talento de Ben Stiller y Eddie Murphy en esta industria, ellos demostraron que sin importar el género, una historia entrañable siempre precederá. Esta historia está lejos de ser perfecta, pero la misma logra hacer que pases un buen momento.

I personally love this movie. It's a great cast Ben Stiller, Eddy Murphy, Matthew Broderick, Michael Pena, and Casey Affleck. Hmmm, so why do I love this movie? 1. it was filmed on location, so many movies today are filmed in a giant green screen, or way too much CGI. This movie gives a pretty good sense of how New York Feels or should I say "used to feel". Pre Covid… NY ain't it nowadays. 2. Where else can you see this all star cast together? 3. It's a fun movie, many of the critics on here gave this movie a low score because the "script" wasn't up to par but this is a Family Movie, I wasn't expecting a complex psychological heist. Overall this is a fun great movie. Lastly I am a very difficult person to please so my stamp of approval on this movie means a lot. So you ever want to see Ben Stiller running around in a comedic hyjinx movie. Check this out.
